sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card
        hover
        >
        <v-card-title 
        class="secondary--text font-weight-bold">
        {{ card.headline }}
        </v-card-title>
        <v-divider></v-divider>
        <v-card-text class="mt-4 font-weight-bold headline">
        {{ card.value }}
        </v-card-text>
        <v-slider
          v-model="percentage"
          thumb-label
          class="mt-4"
          track-color="accent"
          track-fill-color="secondary"
          thumb-color="secondary"
        >
          <template v-slot:append>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="percentage"
              class="mr-2 py-0 mt-0"
              color="secondary"
              hide-details
              single-line
              type="number"
              style="width: 50px"
            ></v-text-field>
          </template>
        </v-slider>
        <v-slider
          v-model="years"
          thumb-label
          track-color="accent"
          track-fill-color="secondary"
          thumb-color="secondary"
          min="2020"
          max="2030"
        >
          <template v-slot:append>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="years"
              class="mr-2 py-0 mt-0"
              color="secondary"
              hide-details
              single-line
              type="number"
              style="width: 50px"
            ></v-text-field>
          </template>
        </v-slider>
        <v-list-item v-for="item in items" :key="`${item.id}`" class="ml-4">
          <v-list-item-text>
            <v-icon color="success">mdi-check-circle-outline</v-icon>
              {{ item.factors }}
          </v-list-item-text>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-card-text class="title font-weight-bold">
          Covers
        </v-card-text>
        <v-checkbox v-for="place in places" :key="`${place.id}`" class="ml-4" background-color="secondary" :label="`${place.location}`" />
    </v-card>
</template>

<script>
/* import { uuid } from '../utils' */

export default {
    name: "PPASliderCards",
    props: {
        card: {
            type: String
        },
    },
    data() {
      return {
        percentage: 50,
        years: 2025,
        items:
          [
          { factors: 'Additionality' },
          { factors: 'Certificates' },
        ],
        places:
            [
            { location: 'Boston' },
            { location: 'Indiana' },
        ],
      };
    }
}
</script>
